name: -social-media-app
description: A social media app using MongoDB, Express, Node, React, GraphQL, and Node. In this repos how to implement a GraphQL server that uses Node and Express to communicate to a MongoDB Database and fetch and persist data to a social media app back-end.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend"  "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
